OOC: It's only a pod, the ship is somewhere in orbit.

Bic:

Computer: Landing complete.

Yggdrasil: Good. Yggdrasil, beast mode!

The two huge machine guns on his shoulders start bending with some 
crackling and come to cover his arms and torso. Some of the "spikes" 
in his back rise to cover his head, and a strange looking face 
appears. His legs retract inside and four massive shorter legs prod 
out of him. His transformation is complete. He is now a giant oak 
fiend.

He moves out quickly about ten meters from the pod and stands besides 
another rather big tree, not moving. It would be difficult for anyone 
to tell him apart only by sight. He starts using his various 
sophisticated sensors to scan the nearby base.

Yggdrasil thinks: Hmm... pretty advanced ecm in that base. If not for 
the geoscan, I wouldn't have found it...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Rogue Star - Command Center:
> 
> Devilcat looks at the readout with an arched eyebrow.  "A Maximal 
> ship, planting itself so close to our headquarters?  This must be 
> investigated - in force."  He keys the comm.  "Torin, Noir, Jayde, 
> Riekan!  Meet me outside and be quick about it!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Don't you guys worry about the gun, I'll incapacitate it as 
> soon 
> > as he gets caught.
> > 
> > Computer: We are now in high orbit. Thrusters at 33%. Position 
> > stabilized.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Good. Geoscan of the surface.
> > 
> > Computer: Geoscan starting... Done.
> > 
> > The holographic map of Earth showed where some bases were located. 
> > Unluckily, it didn't reveal anything else. None of the 
> > characteristics, no faction, nothing.
> > 
> > But Yggdrasil was worried about the number of bases. Five?!? There 
> > were supposed to be only Maximals and Predacons here! Choosing 
> would 
> > be difficult...
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Alright. Computer, aim pod launcher on these 
> coordinates. 
> > Launch 15 seconds after my mark.
> > 
> > Before anything else, he relayed a remote detonator for the ship's 
> > laser to his comm system. He then got in the assault pod and had 
it 
> > moved in the launch tube.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Start launch sequence now!
> > 
> > Fifteen seconds later, he was hurled down at sound-breaking 
speed...
> > 
> > ...only two klicks away from Rogues' ship.
